item.title: Report E-2023080565
item.description:
Report E-2023080565

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: CAMBRIDGE CITY
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On August 2, 2023, one (1) 275-gallon tote of UN1760 was damaged in transit due to improper loading and released approximately two (2) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Indiana Spill Response (ISR) to remediate the impacted surfaces. ISR utilized a forklift to off load the trailer. The crew deployed absorbents to the released material and utilized hand tools to collect the impacted solids. All waste was contained in one (1) 55-gallon drum. ISR contained the old tote and drum for transport and disposal. The new tote remained on the trailer.
